biotools.summary: OMARU (Omnibus metagenome-wide association study with robustness) is a new end-to-end analysis workflow that covers a wide range of microbiome analysis from phylogenetic and functional profiling to case-control metagenome-wide association studies (MWAS).

bioschemas.name: OMARU
bioschemas.summary: OMARU (Omnibus metagenome-wide association study with robustness) is a new end-to-end analysis workflow that covers a wide range of microbiome analysis from phylogenetic and functional profiling to case-control metagenome-wide association studies (MWAS).
